intent_atoms.description: Added MP4RACatalogRefresher and supporting HTTP data provider to ISOInspectorKit, including metadata-aware JSON generation and FourCC normalization.
Extend the isoinspect CLI with a new mp4ra refresh command backed by dependency-injectable environment hooks for testing.
BoxCatalog must remove the fulfilled puzzle reference.
swift test and swift run isoinspect mp4ra refresh must pass.
